ai-anya-e0501n11:1_0: Twelve Jayasena, who are skilled in minds, and who possesses seven (supernatural) faculties, the minds of desire and greed, and hate and delusion, the being looked down onto for seven days.
ai-anya-e0501n11:1_1: They fall down astray working in the Jeta Grove at the time of the Jina, and when the former conditions are fulfilled, he in the former cases a condition for the Jina,
ai-anya-e0501n11:1_2: The lasting of four facts was situated on the west, dropped on the back of the past.
ai-anya-e0501n11:2_1: Entering in the strong heat of the three-fold army, riches, and alms-food enclosed by the power of which the receivers were throwing up residences in the sense of urgency.
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_0: Herein, having the virtues’ special qualities that enlightenment comes from time to time, as in the dissatisfaction with each eliminating the earth, wielding adornment, or delighting in the last watch, then in the last watch of the night, as in the last watches of the Commentaries.
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_1: (but) after one swamping with an empty, scented full-handed and so on, like a dye-sworm-infested sunn hemp clothes and so on.
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_2: while his previous existence ceases, the victor’s mind inclined to the west of the Jina.
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_3: Therefore, after the last age of the Jina, the defeat (tree) arises in him at the end of his sixteenth powers; then having become a strengthen through the air.
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_4: Thus he seized his former (true) mind from the first (of the Saṅgha),
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_5: And the mind rolls towards the last age,
ai-anya-e0501n11:3_6: In that case, even when the family circle of the family is produced in this way, they go to another seven classes of rebirth. Their mind becomes polluted, or their mind becomes clear.
ai-anya-e0501n11:4_0: ‘Here the suttas that are inappropriate in a discourse.’
ai-anya-e0501n11:4_1: They develop the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-anya-e0501n11:4_2: Herein, develops one day in seven days: one months, seven months, or seven months,
ai-anya-e0501n11:5_0: ‘These are the first kind of existence that when developed and cultivated states of existence observed by the past, future, or present.’
ai-anya-e0501n11:6_0: the appropriate occasions, the conditions for the arising of wholesome things, or for the failure in profitable way.
ai-anya-e0501n11:6_1: The purpose of them is the reason why these strengths are the condition for the sake of them.
ai-anya-e0501n11:7_0: And in the world to the development of physical endurances, the development of the mind, and the mental development of the bases of psychic power that will arise in the world, and because there is the development of physical endurance, the development of the mind, and belief.
ai-anya-e0501n11:8_0: all the things which arise in the middle of the day, in the end of all beings. In the last watch, of the night, the manifold system, and the rolling of mass of praise because they arrive at all the time of the Buddhas.
ai-anya-e0501n11:8_1: The rest of the intervals is finished.
